title: pixel XL android 10, screen does not show TIME after open phone case to uncover screen.
content:
my pixel XL phone android 9 with phone case  , has below function before
1. close the case to cover the screen, screen sleep and black 
2. open the case to uncover the screen, screen show the TIME with dark screen

but after my phone upgraded to android 10 , above function DISAPPEAR!!!!

the questions are

1. is this expected behaviors for pixel XL with android 10
2. or is it a bug?
3. or I need to redo some setting to get it back?

thank you very much
